Title: Easing Library For Lua
Description: Easing For Lua is a Library which brings easing effects to let you create realistic animations using Lua Programming Langage
HomeWiki:
Easing For Lua is a Library written in Lua wich brings you lots of easing effects you can use to animate almost everything.
These effects are based on Robert Penner's Easing equations.
Animations can be based on time, or any other thing, like a number of steps.

Credits goes to:
  • Yuichi Tateno's JavaScript Port of Tweener class
  • Kikito's Tween Class
